analyzed: ārya śrī mahādevī vyākaraṇam
om namaḥ sarva buddha bodhisattvebhyaḥ

original: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān sukhāvatyāṃ viharati sma mahatā bodhisattvasaṃghena
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam eka samaye bhagavān sukhāvatyām viharati sma mahatā bodhisattva saṃghena

original: sārdhaṃ - tadyathā avalokiteśvareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena
analyzed: sārdham tat yathā avalokiteśvareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahā sthāmaprāptena

original: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkaṃbhinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkaṃbhinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: kṣitigarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samantabhadreṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: kṣitigarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samantabhadreṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: ākāśagarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vajrapāṇinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: ākāśagarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vajrapāṇinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: sarvabhayahareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ sarvamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena
analyzed: sarva bhaya hareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evam sarva maṅgala dhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena

original: mahāsattvena sarvapuṇyalakṣaṇadhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena candrasūryatrailokyadhāriṇā
analyzed: mahāsattvena sarva puṇya lakṣaṇa dhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena candra sūrya trailokya dhāriṇā

original: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatīrthamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarva tīrtha maṅgala dhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: maṃjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃpramukhairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ / (Śmdv 94)
analyzed: maṃjuśriyā ca kumāra bhūtena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃpramukhaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ

original: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
analyzed: atha khalu ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya ekānte nyaṣīdat
śrīḥ api mahādevī bhagavantam eva upasaṃkrāntā

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śatasahasraṃ pradakṣīṇīkṛtya sarvāṃśca tān sukhāvatīnivāsino bodhisattvān mahāsattvān śirasābhivandyaikānte nyaṣīdat
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śata sahasram pradakṣīṇīkṛtya sarvān ca tān sukhāvatī nivāsinaḥ bodhisattvān mahāsattvān śirasā abhivandya ekānte nyaṣīdat
atha khalu bhagavān aneka śata sahasra puṇya alaṃkṛtaḥ tathāgata koṭi parivṛtaḥ sarva śakra brahma lokapāla stuta stavitaḥ

original: śriyaṃ mahādevīṃ dṛṣṭā mahābrahmasvareṇāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat /
analyzed: śriyam mahādevīm dṛṣṭā mahābrahma svareṇa avalokiteśvaram bodhisattvam mahāsattvam etat avocat

original: yaḥ kaścidavalokiteśvara rājā vā rājamātro vā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrā
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid avalokiteśvara rājā vā rājamātraḥ vā bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikā vā brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viś śūdrā

original: vā śriyā mahādevyā aṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ vimalaprakhyaṃ nāma stotraṃ dhārayiṣyanti tasya
analyzed: vā śriyāḥ mahādevyāḥ aṣṭa uttaram śatam vimalaprakhyam nāma stotram dhārayiṣyanti tasya

original: rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya viṣaye teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvabhayetyupadravā praśamiṣyanti /
analyzed: rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya viṣaye teṣām sattvānām sarva bhayā iti upadravā praśamiṣyanti
sarva cora dhūrta manuṣya amanuṣya bhayam na bhaviṣyati
sarva dhana dhānya kośa koṣṭhāgāra vivṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya gṛhe śrīrnivasiṣyati /
analyzed: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya gṛhe śrīḥ nivasiṣyati

original: atha te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta /
analyzed: atha te bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ evam vācam abhāṣanta
sādhu sādhu
bhagavan su bhāṣitā iyam vāc

original: ye śriyā mahādevyā nāmadheyāni dhārayiṣyanti teṣāmapīmā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: ye śriyāḥ mahādevyāḥ nāmadheyāni dhārayiṣyanti teṣām api imāḥ guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ bhaviṣyanti
atha ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat
kutra bhagavan śriyā mahādevyā kuśala mūlam avaropitam
bhagavān āha
gaṃgā nadī vālukā samānām tathāgatānām antikāt śriyā mahādevyā kuśala mūlam avaropitam
bhūta pūrvam avalokiteśvara atīte adhvani ratnasaṃbhavāyām lokadhātau ratna kusuma guṇa sāgara vaidūrya kanaka giri suvarṇa kāṃcana prabhāsaśrīḥ nāma tathāgataḥ
loke udapādi

original: tasyāntike śriyā mahādevyā kuśalamūlamavaropitamanyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmantike /
analyzed: tasya antike śriyā mahādevyā kuśala mūlam avaropitam anyeṣām ca bahūnām tathāgatānām antike

original: imāni ca tathāgatanāmāni tasyāḥ śriyā mahādevyāḥ kuśalamūlavivṛddhisaṃpattikarāṇi /
analyzed: imāni ca tathāgata nāmāni tasyāḥ śriyāḥ mahādevyāḥ kuśala mūla vivṛddhi saṃpatti karāṇi

original: sadānubaddhānitāni śriyā mahādevyā yānīha samudḥritāni sarvapāpaharāṇi sarvakilviṣanāśanāni
analyzed: sadā anubaddhāni tāni śriyā mahādevyā yāni iha samudḥritāni sarva pāpa harāṇi sarva kilviṣa nāśanāni
sarva kārya vimalīkaraṇāni dhana dhānya ākarṣaṇa vivṛddhi karāṇi dāridrya paricchedana karāṇi
sarva deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga āvarjana ākarṣaṇa karāṇi
ṣaṣ pāramitā niṣpādana karāṇi
namaḥ śrīghanāya tathāgatāya
namaḥ ratna kusuma guṇa sāgara vaiḍūrya kanaka giri suvarṇa kāṃcana prabhāsa śriye tathāgatāya
namaḥ gaṅgā sarva tīrtha mukha maṅgala śriye tathāgatāya
namaḥ candana kusuma tejaḥ nakṣatra prabhāsa śriye tathāgatāya
namaḥ samanta avabhāsa vijita saṃgrāma śriye tathāgatāya
namaḥ guṇa samudra avabhāsa maṇḍala śriye tathāgatāya

namaḥ saumya ākarṣaṇa śriye tathāgatāya

original: imāni tathāgatanāmāni satkṛtya dhārayitavyāni vācayitavyāni evaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
analyzed: imāni tathāgata nāmāni satkṛtya dhārayitavyāni vācayitavyāni evam sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bahutaram puṇyam prasaviṣyati
vyākṛtā ca śrī mahādevī tathāgataiḥ

original: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ śrīmahādevī anāgate 'dhvani śrīmahāratnapratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau tatra śrīmaṇiratnasambhavo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyak sambuddhaḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyasi tvam śrī mahādevī anāgate adhvani śrī mahā ratna pratimaṇḍitāyām lokadhātau tatra śrīmaṇiratnasambhavaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyak sambuddhaḥ
sā ca lokadhātuḥ nānā divya ratna pratimaṇḍitā bhaviṣyati

original: (Śmdv 98) tatra ca lokadhātau sa eva tathāgata ālokakaro bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra ca lokadhātau saḥ eva tathāgataḥ āloka karaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: te ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre svayaṃprabhā bhaviṣyantyaparimitāyuṣaśca /
analyzed: te ca bodhisattvāḥ tatra buddhakṣetre svayaṃprabhāḥ bhaviṣyanti aparimita āyuṣaḥ ca
ākāśataḥ ca buddha dharma saṅgha śabdaḥ niścariṣyati

original: ye ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre upapatsyante sarve te padmakarkaṭikāsūpapatsyante /
analyzed: ye ca bodhisattvāḥ tatra buddhakṣetre upapatsyante sarve te padma karkaṭikāsu upapatsyante
tatra katamat dādaśadaṇḍakam nāma aṣṭaśatam vimala prakhyam stotram
śṛṇu abhayāvalokiteśvara śriyāḥ mahādevyāḥ nāmāni
tat yathā sarva tathāgata abhiṣiktā sarva devatā abhiṣiktā sarva tathāgata mātā sarva devatā mātā
sarva tathāgata śrīḥ sarva bodhisattva śrīḥ sarva ārya śrāvaka pratyekabuddha śrīḥ brahma viṣṇu maheśvara śrīḥ
mahāsthāna gata śrīḥ sarva devatā abhimukha śrīḥ sarva deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga śrīḥ
sarva vidyādhara vajrapāṇi vajradhara śrīḥ catur pañca lokapāla śrīḥ aṣṭa graha aṣṭāviṃśati nakṣatra śrīḥ

original: om sāvitrī dhātrī mātā caturvedaśrīḥ lakṣmīḥ bhūtamātā jayā vijayā gaṅgā sarvatīrthā
analyzed: om sāvitrī dhātrī mātā catur veda śrīḥ lakṣmīḥ bhūtamātā jayā vijayā gaṅgā sarvatīrthā

original: sarvamaṅgalyā vimalanirmalakaraśrīḥ sarvapāpahantrī nirmadakarā candraśrīḥ sūryaśrīḥ

analyzed: sarva graha śrīḥ siṃha vāhinī śata sahasra koṭi padma vivara saṃcchannā padmā padma sambhavā

original: padmālayā padmadharā padmāvatī anekaratnāṃśumālā dhanadā śvetā mahāśvetā śvetabhujā

analyzed: sarva maṅgala dhāriṇī sarva puṇya upacita aṅgī dākṣāyaṇī śata sahasra bhujā śata sahasra nayanā
śata sahasra śirāḥ

original: vividhavicitramaṇimaulidharā surūpā viśvarūpā yaśā mahāyaśā saumyā bahujīmūtā pavitrakeśā
analyzed: vividha vicitra maṇi mauli dharā surūpā viśva rūpā yaśā mahā yaśā saumyā bahu jīmūtā pavitra keśā

original: candrakāntā sūryakāntā śubhā śubhakartrī sarvasattvābhimukhī āryākusumaśrīḥ kusumeśvarā

analyzed: sarva sumeru parvata rāja śrīḥ sarva nadī sarīt śrīḥ sarva toya samudra śrīḥ sarva tīrtha abhimukha śrīḥ
sarva oṣadhi tṛṇa vanaspati dhana dhānya śrīḥ hiraṇya dā anna pāna dā prabhāsvarā āloka karā
pavitra aṅgā sarva tathāgata vaśavartinī sarva deva gaṇa mukha śrīḥ yama varuṇa a kubera vāsava śrīḥ

original: dātrī bhoktrī tejā tejovatī vibhūtīḥ samṛddhiḥ vivṛddhiḥ unnatiḥ dharmaśrīḥ mādhavāśrayā
kusumanilayā anasūyā puruṣakārāśrayā sarvapavitragātrā maṅgalahastā sarvālakṣmīnāśayitrī
analyzed: kusuma nilayā anasūyā puruṣakāra āśrayā sarva pavitra gātrā maṅgala hastā sarva alakṣmī nāśayitrī
sarva puṇya ākarṣaṇa śrīḥ sarva pṛthivī śrīḥ sarva rāja śrīḥ sarva vidyādhara rāja śrīḥ sarva bhūta yakṣa rākṣasa preta piśāca kuṃbhāṇḍa mahā uraga śrīḥ

original: dyutiḥ pramodabhāgyalolā sarvarṣipavitraśrīḥ sarvaśrīḥ bhavajyeṣṭhottamaśrīḥ sarvakinnarasarvasūryottamaśrīḥ
analyzed: dyutiḥ pramoda bhāgya lolā sarva ṛṣi pavitra śrīḥ sarva śrīḥ bhava jyeṣṭha uttama śrīḥ sarva kinnara sarva sūrya uttama śrīḥ

original: om vilokaya tāraya mocaya mama sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ sarvapuṇyasambhārānāmukhīkuru svāhā /
analyzed: om vilokaya tāraya mocaya mama sarva duḥkhebhyaḥ sarva puṇya sambhārān āmukhīkuru svāhā
om gaṅgā ādi sarva tīrthāni āmuikhīkuru svāhā
om sāvitryai svāhā

viṣṇave svāhā
rudrāya svāhā
viśvamukhāya svāhā

original: om nigrigrini sarvakāryasādhani sini sini āvāhayāmi
analyzed: om nigrigrini sarva kārya sādhani sini sini āvāhayāmi

sarva pavitra maṅgala hastāyai svāhā

original: imāni tānyabhayāvalokiteśvaraśriyā mahādevyā nāmāni sarvakilviṣanāśanāni sarvapāpavidhvaṃsanakarāṇi
analyzed: imāni tāni abhayāvalokiteśvara śriyāḥ mahādevyāḥ nāmāni sarva kilviṣa nāśanāni sarva pāpa vidhvaṃsana karāṇi
sarva puṇya ākarṣaṇa karāṇi sarva alakṣmī praśamana karāṇi sarva śrī saubhāgya ākarṣaṇa karāṇi

original: yaḥ kaścidvārayiṣyati imāni tathāgatanāmāni kalyamutthāya śucinā sarvabuddhānāṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid vārayiṣyati imāni tathāgata nāmāni kalyam utthāya śucinā sarva buddhānām puṣpa dhūpam

original: dattvā śriyai mahādevyai candanadhūpaṃ dattvā vācayitavyāni sarvaśriyamadhigamiṣyati
analyzed: dattvā śriyai mahādevyai candana dhūpam dattvā vācayitavyāni sarva śriyam adhigamiṣyati
sarva sukha saumanasya lābhī bhaviṣyati sarva devatāḥ ca rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kariṣyanti
sarva kārya siddhiḥ tasya bhaviṣyati
idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ abhayāvalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ

original: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
analyzed: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan
